_default_.notes: Fallback voice for characters without specific assignments

Imoen.notes: Iconic companion with extensive party banter - Cheery, High energy, Bright timbre (59.2 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Minsc.notes: Ranger with hamster Boo - Boisterous, Very high energy, Boomy timbre (64.6 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Jaheira.notes: Druid widow - Stern, Medium energy, Mature timbre (31.4 sec ref from BG2 audio). Using base reference only, no speed/pitch adjustment.

Viconia.notes: Drow cleric - Sardonic, Medium energy, Cool timbre

Edwin.notes: Red Wizard - Arrogant, Medium energy, Sardonic timbre

Aerie.notes: Avariel elf - Timid, Low energy, Gentle timbre

Korgan.notes: Dwarven berserker - Aggressive, High energy, Gruff timbre

Anomen.notes: Fighter/Cleric - Conflicted, Medium energy, Noble timbre

Keldorn.notes: Paladin - Righteous, Medium energy, Wise timbre

Nalia.notes: Noble mage - Idealist, Medium energy, Light timbre

HaerDalis.notes: Tiefling bard - Poetic, Medium energy, Smooth timbre

Cernd.notes: Druid - Philosophical, Low energy, Deep timbre

Mazzy.notes: Halfling paladin - Heroic, High energy, Strong timbre

Valygar.notes: Ranger - Stoic, Low energy, Flat timbre (44.0 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Yoshimo.notes: Bounty hunter - Charming, Medium energy, Smooth timbre (50.6 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Sarevok.notes: Former villain - Menacing, Low energy, Deep timbre

Rielev.notes: Dying prisoner NPC (17.7 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Dryad.notes: Forest spirit NPC (8.1 sec ref from BG2 audio)

Ilyich.notes: Duergar clan chief - Scottish accent, military commander (ElevenLabs custom voice generation, deeper pitch -2, 5% slower, longer pauses)

IDRYAD1.notes: Dryad NPC (uses same ref as Dryad)

IDRYAD2.notes: Dryad NPC (uses same ref as Dryad)

IDRYAD3.notes: Dryad NPC (uses same ref as Dryad)

PORTAL.notes: Portal genie - mystical entity that trades energy cells (using Valygar's voice)
